name: Proxy to webflow.txt - Overview
description: This section explains how a subdomain (rize.razorpay.com) is configured to use a proxy service (proxy-ssl.webflow.com) through a CNAME record. This allows the subdomain to be served by the proxy service, which can provide additional functionality or security features.
use_cases: Proxying a subdomain to a third-party service
Enabling additional features or security for a subdomain
Routing traffic through a proxy for performance or caching

name: Proxy to webflow.txt - Example for Rize
description: This section provides an example of a Terraform module that can be used to create a CNAME record for the Webflow service. The example code is hosted on GitHub, and the provided link directs the reader to the specific section of the code that demonstrates how to set up the CNAME record. This could be useful for developers or system administrators who need to configure DNS records for their web applications or services.
use_cases: Setting up a CNAME record for the Webflow service
Configuring DNS records for web applications or services
Using Terraform for infrastructure as code (IaC) and automating DNS management

name: Proxy to webflow.txt - Terraform Module
description: This section suggests that the technical aspects of setting up the proxy to Webflow have been covered, and the remaining tasks, such as designing and developing the website's front-end, will be handled by designers and front-end developers. It implies that the technical setup is complete, and the focus can now shift to the visual and user experience aspects of the website.
capabilities: Handoff to design and development teams

name: Proxy to webflow.txt - Instructions for Developers
description: This section explains the process for developers to make their website, created on the Webflow platform, accessible through a custom domain name. It involves publishing the website on Webflow and then enabling the CNAME (Canonical Name) record to associate the custom domain with the Webflow-hosted website. This allows users to access the website using a personalized domain name instead of the default Webflow URL.
use_cases: Enabling a custom domain for a website built on Webflow
Associating a custom domain with a Webflow-hosted website
Improving branding and professionalism by using a custom domain
